name: Crackegg: Repaired Edition
description:
Play as a chicken (player 1) who is adrift on a broken raft. Repair the raft to protect your eggs, while an evil flamingo (a player 2) tries to destroy the raft. The game is made for two players and more. Game controllers are needed.

Members:
Landry CASTAGNÉ
Laurence DENIS-SYLVAIN
Kévin DUGUAY
Jason DURAND
Niko GIRARDELLI
Maxime HARDY
Flore JEANNEAU
Joseph MÉRINEAU
Aurelie MOINE
Noé VINCENT
